sub_title: MOM Support Manager at Johnson Matthey
summary:
Career Objective:
To deliver excellent ICT services to a Business in order not to meet business requirements and expectations but to exceed them. Always focussing on continuous improvement and on adding value to a Business.

Specialties: 
Management of IT professionals,
ICT Service Delivery Management,
Business Relationship Management,
Business Demand Management.

Skills:
people manager
motivator
communicator
